text: qal alssadat walkbra' min qawm shueayb aladhin tkbru ean al'iiman biallah waitibae rasulih shueayb ealayh alslam: lanukhrijanak ya shueayb wman maeak min almuminin min dyarna, 'illa 'iidha srtm 'iilaa dynna, qal shueyb mnkrana wmtejbana min qwlhm: antabekm ealaa dinakum wmillatkm albatlt, walaw kunaa karihin laha leilmina bbtlanha?
